snippet: Stefano Pilati, who worked at Saint Laurent in Paris for eight years before being let go after mixed reviews, will join Zegna as creative director, where his mission will include building up the Agnona women's brand.
abstract: Ermenegildo Zegna hires designer Stefano Pilati as creative director in an effort to strengthen its core brand and breathe new life into its little-known Agnona women's fashion line; Pilati is best known for his work at Yves Saint Laurent.
lead_paragraph: Stefano Pilati, who worked at Saint Laurent in Paris for eight years before being let go after mixed reviews, will join Zegna as creative director, where his mission will include building up the Agnona women's brand.

headline.main: Zegna Hires Designer From Saint Laurent to Bolster Brand
headline.print_headline: Zegna Hires Designer From Saint Laurent to Bolster Brand
